visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts pie chart with a custom entrance animation. The chart should display the 'Departamental Strength of the Company' with data series representing different departments and their percentages. The chart should have a title and subtitle aligned to the left, with custom styling for labels and axes. The pie chart should have a border width of 2, and data labels should be formatted to show the department name and percentage. The chart should also include a tooltip that displays the department name and percentage when hovering over a slice. The animation should fan out from the center of the pie chart, with a duration of 2000 milliseconds.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts configuration is designed to render a pie chart that visualizes the 'Departamental Strength of the Company'. The chart includes a custom entrance animation where each slice of the pie fans out from the center, creating a visually engaging effect. The title and subtitle are aligned to the left, providing clear context for the data being presented. The pie chart itself has a border width of 2, and data labels are enabled to show both the department name and its corresponding percentage, formatted with bold text for the department name and a line break for clarity. The tooltip, activated on hover, displays the same information for each slice. The animation duration is set to 2000 milliseconds, ensuring a smooth and noticeable entrance effect. This configuration leverages Highcharts' extensive customization options to create a polished and informative data visualization.
